DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness safety investigational drug , tanezumab , adult patient painful diabetic peripheral neuropathy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Analgesic ( Pain-Relief ) Effects Of Tanezumab In Adult Patients With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
DOC.detailed_description: This study terminate 18 November 2010 follow US FDA clinical hold tanezumab diabetic peripheral neuropathy clinical study halt dose enrollment patient 19 July 2010 potential safety issue .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis diabetes mellitus ( high blood sugar ) HbA1c level ≤11 % Screening , stable antidiabetic medication regimen 30 day prior randomization . Diagnosis diabetic peripheral neuropathy pain legs foot decrease sensation foot decreased/absent ankle jerk/ reflex . Presence ongoing pain due diabetic peripheral neuropathy least 3 month . A pain score great equal ( ≥ ) 4 diabetic peripheral neuropathy Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) , 11point scale 0 meaning pain 10 meaning worst pain Screening . Be willing stop pain medication diabetic peripheral neuropathy except limited use acetaminophen ( Tylenol ) ibuprofenlike ( Motrin ) medication Screening Baseline use prohibit pain medication throughout duration study except permit study guideline . Painful neuropathy diabetic peripheral neuropathy . Other type diabetic neuropathy . Patients past history carpal tunnel syndrome ( CTS ) sign symptom CTS one year prior Screening eligible participation . Patients fibromyalgia , regional pain cause lumbar cervical compression radiculopathy moderate severe pain . Patients present ( current ) history sciatica eligible participation . The presence pain condition distinguish diabetic peripheral neuropathy peripheral vascular disease . Amputations dues diabetes .
